casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tywaine Sherell DENNY. No. 572PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 17, 2007. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC. Jarvis John Edgerton, IV, for Denny.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of January 2007 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 29th day of January 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of January 2007."
